TopicTitle: Val and Jeb in the Spaceplane Hangar, discussing Budget Cuts with Linus

Articles.Content:
![6GUdkry.png](http://i.imgur.com/6GUdkry.png)

"Why is this happening?" Valentina asked

"Revert bugs. Revert bugs keep wiping our parts list and letting you guys into the VAB/SPH" Linus responded.

"And I can plant a flag!" Jeb said.

"Yes, this is but one of our problems, no get out of the Spaceplane Hangar so we can work!" Linus finished, shooing the astronauts towards the exit.

Incidentally, I have noticed as soon as I loaded the VAB/SPH first time in 1.0, that there are no female Kerbals in the VAB/SPH grounds.

> 
> If you ever get a blank part list from reverting flight to VAB or SPH (which *might* be from the 0.90 firespitter.dll), delete the root part of the ship, and the entire parts list becomes available, including Kerbals, Flags, and Asteroids.
> 
> ![pgluLfD.png](http://i.imgur.com/pgluLfD.png)
> 
> ![4Q8E437.png](http://i.imgur.com/4Q8E437.png)
> 
> ![9hzjHjY.png](http://i.imgur.com/9hzjHjY.png)
> 
> Now, get to work impressing me with your own funny scenes in the VAB/SPH using Kerbal Astronauts that are now a thing.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-02T00:08:25Z" title="05/02/2015 12:08  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 2, 2015</time> by GregroxMun**
"We don't allow GIRLS in here!" he followed up.
